response.original_title: (Sex Workers Cry) Rights Not Rescue in Cambodia
response.overview: In Rights Not Rescue, the film’s subjects question Cambodia’s focus on training ‘Rescued’ female sex workers to sew in low wage garment factories. They want governments, NGOs, labour unions, and donors to seriously address workers’ rights and help women enter different fields where they can actually earn a living wage.
response.title: (Sex Workers Cry) Rights Not Rescue in Cambodia
